channel.title: doit - DigitalOcean Interactive Tool
channel.description: Recent content on doit - DigitalOcean Interactive Tool

item.title: doctl
item.description:
doctl

doctl is a command line interface for the DigitalOcean API.

Synopsis

doctl is a command line interface for the DigitalOcean API.

Options

  -t, --access-token string   DigitalOcean API V2 Access Token
  -o, --output string         output formt [text|json] (default "text")
      --trace                 verbose output
  -v, --verbose               verbose output

SEE ALSO

  • doctl account - account commands
  • doctl auth - auth commands
  • doctl compute - compute commands
  • doctl version - show the current version
Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 16-Mar-2016

item.title: doctl compute action list
item.description:
doctl compute action list

list actions

Synopsis

list actions

doctl compute action list

Options

      --action-type string     Action type
      --after string           Action completed after in RFC3339 format
      --before string          Action completed before in RFC3339 format
      --format string          Columns for output in a comma seperated list. Possible values: ID,Status,Type,StartedAt,CompletedAt,ResourceID,ResourceType,Region
      --no-header              hide headers
      --region string          Action region
      --resource-type string   Action resource type
      --status string          Action status

Options inherited from parent commands

  -t, --access-token string   DigitalOcean API V2 Access Token
  -o, --output string         output formt [text|json] (default "text")
      --trace                 verbose output
  -v, --verbose               verbose output

SEE ALSO

  • doctl compute action - action commands
Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 16-Mar-2016

item.title: doctl compute action wait
item.description:
doctl compute action wait

wait for action to complete

Synopsis

wait for action to complete

doctl compute action wait ACTIONID

Options

      --format string      Columns for output in a comma seperated list. Possible values: ID,Status,Type,StartedAt,CompletedAt,ResourceID,ResourceType,Region
      --no-header          hide headers
  -p, --poll-timeout int   Re-poll time in seconds (default 5)

Options inherited from parent commands

  -t, --access-token string   DigitalOcean API V2 Access Token
  -o, --output string         output formt [text|json] (default "text")
      --trace                 verbose output
  -v, --verbose               verbose output

SEE ALSO

  • doctl compute action - action commands
Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 16-Mar-2016
